name: Portaling - Demo
description:
Portaling is a Unity Asset that allows the placement of seamless world portals, with full physics integration and minimal installation required.

The asset can be easily integrated both in existing and new projects, with only 3 layers required to be defined. This demo scene highlights the asset's functionality.

Portaling is supported for Windows builds. Android has been reported to work, however portal recursion (portal-in-portal views) is not supported, and other builds have not yet been tested.

You can purchase this asset here: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/portaling-87424
